<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Accurate Swing](/Feats.aspx?ID=3334) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Vigilante" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=326" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Night of the Gray Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=99) pg. 65</row>

**Archetype** [Gray Gardener](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=124)

**Prerequisites**
[Vigilante Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2083); [Harsh Judgment](/Feats.aspx?ID=3330)

</column>

---

You strike cleanly with wide, sweeping attacks to inflict maximum damage, taking advantage of your judged foe's fear to land a felling blow. If you Strike a creature you condemned with Harsh Judgment that has the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition with a [sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194) melee weapon or a [sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194) unarmed attack, you gain a circumstance bonus to the Strike's damage equal to the number of weapon damage dice your weapon deals.
name: Accurate Swing
